summary.para: Represents the drawing state of a render target: the antialiasing mode, transform, tags, and text-rendering options.

remarks.para: To create an ID2D1DrawingStateBlock, use the ID2D1Factory.CreateDrawingStateBlock method.
A drawing state block is a device-independent resource; you can create it once and retain it for the life of your application. For more information about resources, see the Resources Overview.
